projects.description:
2024 – Present
• Developed a full-featured Flutter fitness running application implementing MVVM with Clean Architecture, featuring
real-time GPS tracking, route visualization, and comprehensive analytics dashboard with SQLite for offline data persistence
and real time syncing with Firebase firestore.
• Built a high-precision location tracking system using Flutter Location services, implementing smart route smoothing
algorithms and integrating OpenStreetMap with flutter map for real-time route visualization and replay functionality.
• Designed an extensible analytics engine utilizing Provider state management to process workout metrics, generating detailed
performance insights, and visualizing progress through custom-built interactive charts and heatmaps.
• Implemented a sophisticated goal tracking system with custom training plans, featuring milestone-based progression,
achievement notifications, and adaptive workout suggestions based on user performance data.
Employee Dashboard Application
2024 – Present
• Developing a full-stack employee dashboard using Spring Boot (Java) and Angular, leveraging Spring Data JPA and
PostgreSQL for scalable and reliable data persistence.
• Designed and implemented a RESTful API with JWT-based authentication and fine-grained, role-based access control
(Admin/Non-Admin) for secure, tailored access.
• Creating features such as real-time time tracking, editable work logs, visual analytics, leave management, meeting
coordination, GeoLocation-based sign-in, and calendar integration.
• Building a responsive, user-centric UI with adaptive navigation; planning Docker-based deployment for environment
consistency; and managing codebase with Git.
Brownfields - Robot Worlds Game (WeThinkCode)
2023 – 2024
• Led a team to restore a legacy multiplayer client-server game in Java, designing and implementing a multi-threaded
architecture for real-time gameplay and concurrent client interactions.
• Developed a high-performance server using Java’s threading model, where each client connection runs on a dedicated thread,
ensuring seamless command execution and world updates.
• Implemented background worker threads for continuous world-state synchronization, using Java TimerTasks and thread-safe
data structures to prevent race conditions.
• Developed a custom protocol using JSON serialization for real-time robot control, optimizing network efficiency and later
migrating to HTTP.
• Applied layered architecture and SOLID principles, improving maintainability and scalability, with a dynamic UI built using
Turtle for visual representation of in-game interactions.
Achievements & Certifications
HackerRank Certifications: Java (Basic), Problem Solving with Java (Intermediate)
Medallion - WeThinkCode Systems Development Semester 1 & 2 Top 10 Performer
